attributes.action: Guarantee that Britain will become an exclusively metric country by the end of this decade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not true that we 'need' imperial measures to trade with the US. Firstly, American customary measures are different than our imperial measures; we have introduced our imperial measures in 1824 - AFTER America became independent from Britain. Secondly, the US is now being slowly but continually metricated. It's also untrue that imp. measures are British; most of them were imposed by the Romans and even their abbrevations such as lb and oz are Italian.
